verses.verse: I <S%G1473><s%> command <S%G1263><s%> you therefore <S%G3767><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who will <S%G3195><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> at <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> appearing <S%G2015><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Kingdom: <S%G932><s%>

preach <S%G2784><s%> the word; <S%G3056><s%> be urgent <S%G2186><s%> in season <S%G2122><s%> and out of season; <S%G171><s%> reprove, <S%G1651><s%> rebuke, <S%G2008><s%> and exhort, <S%G3870><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> patience <S%G3115><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> teaching. <S%G1322><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> will <S%G430><s%> come <S%G2071><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they will <S%G430><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> listen to the sound <S%G5198><s%> doctrine, <S%G1319><s%> but, <S%G235><s%> having itching <S%G2833><s%> ears, <S%G189><s%> will heap <S%G2002><s%> up for themselves <S%G1438><s%> teachers <S%G1320><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> their own <S%G2398><s%> lusts; <S%G1939><s%>
and <S%G2532><s%> will turn away <S%G654><s%> their ears <S%G189><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the truth, <S%G225><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> turn <S%G1624><s%> aside to <S%G1909><s%> fables. <S%G3454><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> be sober <S%G3525><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> suffer hardship, <S%G2553><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> of an evangelist, <S%G2099><s%> and fulfill <S%G4135><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> ministry. <S%G1248><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G4689><s%> already <S%G2235><s%> being offered, <S%G4689><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> of my <S%G1699><s%> departure <S%G359><s%> has come. <S%G2186><s%>
I have fought <S%G75><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> fight. <S%G73><s%> I have finished <S%G5055><s%> the course. <S%G1408><s%> I have kept <S%G5083><s%> the faith. <S%G4102><s%>

From now on, <S%G3063><s%> there is stored up <S%G606><s%> for me <S%G3427><s%> the crown <S%G4735><s%> of righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%> judge, <S%G2923><s%> will give <S%G591><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day; <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to me <S%G1698><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> those <S%G25><s%> who have loved <S%G25><s%> his <S%G846><s%> appearing. <S%G2015><s%>
Be diligent <S%G4704><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> soon, <S%G5030><s%>

for <S%G1063><s%> Demas <S%G1214><s%> left <S%G1459><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> having loved <S%G25><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> present <S%G3568><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G1519><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Thessalonica; <S%G2332><s%> Crescens <S%G2913><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Galatia, <S%G1053><s%> and Titus <S%G5103><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Dalmatia. <S%G1149><s%>

Only <S%G3441><s%> Luke <S%G3065><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me. <S%G1700><s%> Take <S%G353><s%> Mark, <S%G3138><s%> and <S%G353><s%> bring <S%G71><s%> him with <S%G3326><s%> you, <S%G4572><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> useful <S%G2173><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> service. <S%G1248><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> I sent <S%G649><s%> Tychicus <S%G5190><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Ephesus. <S%G2181><s%>

Bring <S%G5342><s%> the cloak <S%G5341><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I left <S%G620><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Troas <S%G5174><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> Carpus <S%G2591><s%> when you come, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the books, <S%G975><s%> especially <S%G3122><s%> the parchments. <S%G3200><s%>

Alexander, <S%G223><s%> the coppersmith, <S%G5471><s%> did <S%G1731><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> to me. <S%G3427><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> will repay <S%G591><s%> him <S%G846><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%>

of <S%G5442><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> must beware; <S%G5442><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G436><s%> greatly <S%G3029><s%> opposed <S%G436><s%> our <S%G2251><s%> words. <S%G3056><s%>

At <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> defense, <S%G627><s%> no one <S%G3762><s%> came to help <S%G4836><s%> me, <S%G3427><s%> but <S%G235><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> left <S%G1459><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%> May <S%G3049><s%> it not <S%G3361><s%> be held <S%G3049><s%> against them. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> stood <S%G3936><s%> by me, <S%G3427><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> strengthened <S%G1743><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> the message <S%G2782><s%> might be fully proclaimed, <S%G4135><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that all <S%G3956><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> might hear; <S%G191><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I was delivered <S%G4506><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of the lion. <S%G3023><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> will deliver <S%G4506><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> from <S%G575><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> work, <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will preserve <S%G4982><s%> me for <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> heavenly <S%G2032><s%> Kingdom; <S%G932><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> be the glory <S%G1391><s%> forever <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
Greet <S%G782><s%> Prisca <S%G4251><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Aquila, <S%G207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of Onesiphorus. <S%G3683><s%>

Erastus <S%G2037><s%> remained <S%G3306><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Corinth, <S%G2882><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> I left <S%G620><s%> Trophimus <S%G5161><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Miletus <S%G3399><s%> sick. <S%G770><s%>

Be diligent to come <S%G2064><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> winter. <S%G5494><s%> Eubulus <S%G2103><s%> salutes <S%G782><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> as <S%G2532><s%> do Pudens, <S%G4227><s%> Linus, <S%G3044><s%> Claudia, <S%G2803><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the brothers. <S%G80><s%>

The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> spirit. <S%G4151><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%> Amen. <S%G3505><s%>
